nodes.text: The AV-21 was a type of vehicle. In 10 BBY, the Corellian Han Solo told Tobias Beckett that he had been stealing AV-21s since he was ten years old.

In the Star Wars canon, AV-21s were first mentioned in the 2018 Anthology film Solo: A Star Wars Story. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, AV-21s were a type of landspeeder created for the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies.
Star Wars 7 features a landspeeder resembling the Legends version of the AV-21; however, the comic does not identify the vehicle by name.
